location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 32 of 1866 from Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bombay to Charles Gonne, Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Sayed Torkee [Turki bin Said] who is residing at Bushire but who is penniless and asking Government's permission to grant him a small allowance and asking whether he should continue to permit him to stay there or send him on to Bombay.
